items.title: Real-Time Language Detection
items.content: VibeTrans offers a smart language detection tool with over 90% accuracy. It automatically identifies the input language, ensuring seamless translation without the need for manual selection. This feature saves you time and effort, allowing you to focus on the translation results rather than setup. Enjoy hassle-free multilingual communication with our efficient system.

items.title: Versatile Translation Modes
items.content: Explore five unique translation modes: technical, legal, literary, idiomatic, and general. Each mode is designed to cater to specific needs, ensuring precise translations. Whether you're working on a legal document or a creative story, VibeTrans provides the right tools to achieve accurate results, enhancing your text's clarity and effectiveness.

items.title: Multi-Modal Translation Support
items.content: VibeTrans supports text, image OCR, and audio transcription. This multi-modal functionality allows you to translate various formats, making it ideal for diverse scenarios. From converting handwritten notes to spoken language, VibeTrans ensures all your translation needs are met efficiently. Experience comprehensive language support with our advanced tools.

items.title: Privacy-First Data Handling
items.content: Concerned about confidentiality? VibeTrans utilizes a privacy sandbox, storing translations locally on your browser. This means no server records are kept, ensuring your sensitive information remains safe. Feel confident pasting confidential texts, knowing that privacy and security are our top priorities in maintaining your data's integrity.
